translation.en: [man 2] So what do you think, Joe?
I don’t know.
I don’t think that’s for me to say.
A second chance?
I mean, it’s a nice idea, but...
But?
-How do you feel? -Feel?
I feel that I was a nightmare.
I made terrible choices.
I drove my family away. I--
I hurt people.
I didn’t mean to, but there it is.
translation.de: Nicht absichtlich, aber so ist es.

translation.en: And for all that...
there’s a hole inside me now.
It hurts. I carry it.
translation.de: Ich trage den Schmerz in mir.

translation.en: Like Phil Coakley hurts?
Of course not.
But I know the work I’ve done. You’ve seen that.
translation.de: Aber Sie haben gesehen, was ich tat.

translation.en: -Yeah. I have. -Right.
I got almost six years.
That’s real.
That’s clarity.
I can’t do anything about before. That’s done.
But I can show people I’ve changed.
Like with my behavior.
And my girls.
I can be their father again.
translation.de: Ich kann wieder ihr Vater sein.

translation.en: And that’s what you want?
That’s all there is.
A second chance.
Why not?
I have faith in you, Joe.
-Thank you, Morris. -[door buzzes]
[guard] Let’s go.
Would you like to take communion before you go?
Oh, no. I’m good.
-[Joe] Keep the change. -Thanks.
[man] Mother’s got her soup line today late.
translation.de: Mutter hat Spätdienst in der Suppenküche.

translation.en: I think we expected to see you next week.
-Ah, she’d have meant to be here. -It’s okay.
Well, she’d have meant to be here.
translation.de: Tja, sie wäre gern hier gewesen.

translation.en: -[Joe] Wait. Here. -[grunts]
Retired, huh?
Yeah. I couldn’t hump the lines anymore.
translation.de: Ja. Die Kraft reichte nicht mehr.

translation.en: Look, uh, you know, such a long trip up there
translation.de: Hör zu, die lange Fahrt dorthin

translation.en: and my back being what it is.
-I know. -Still, we should have.
-I just, uh-- -I know.
They brought some of your stuff back when they closed your apartment. It’s downstairs in your space if you wanna--
translation.de: Das Zeug aus deiner alten Wohnung steht unten in deinem Zimmer, falls du...

translation.en: Sure.
Oh, no.
I missed you too.
[automated voice] The number you’ve reached is not in service--
-[Joe] Where’d they move to? -[man] We don’t know.
We haven’t spoken to Elaine since you went up.
translation.de: Der Kontakt zu Elaine ist abgebrochen.

translation.en: [Joe] What about the girls? Birthdays? Christmas?
We are not in touch anymore.
-You never called? -She wouldn’t accept ’em.
Well, she’s not obligated to.
translation.de: Nun, sie ist zu nichts verpflichtet.

translation.en: The settlement was clear--
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I contested that fucking settlement.
translation.de: Moment. Ich habe das verdammte Ding angefochten.

translation.en: A clean break now, Joe, while the girls are young.
translation.de: Ein sauberer Schnitt, jetzt wo die Mädchen klein sind.

translation.en: It’s a shame, but maybe she’s right.
translation.de: Ein Jammer, aber vielleicht hat sie recht.

translation.en: Can I borrow the truck?
-Your mother will be home-- -Dad.
I’ve been indoors six years. Please.
translation.de: Ich war sechs Jahre eingesperrt. Bitte.

translation.en: [girl] Hello?
It’s Daddy, sweetie.
It’s your dad.
My dad?
How are you, baby?
Hmm. Good.
How’s your sister?
She’s okay.
That’s great.
Um, you know, I--
I’ve been away because... Well, I had to be away.
translation.de: Ich war weg, weil... na ja, weil ich musste...

translation.en: It wasn’t my fault.
Well, it was, but I was sick and...
But now-- now I’m better, see, and we--
translation.de: Aber jetzt... ...geht es mir besser, und wir...

translation.en: Can you hold on?
Melissa. Melissa, wait. Wait. I love you.
translation.de: Melissa, warte. Ich hab dich lieb.

translation.en: [woman] Joe?
Hey, sweetie.
How did you get this number?
I know. I just wanted to talk to the girls.
translation.de: Ich wollte nur mit den Mädchen sprechen.

translation.en: Joe, you know that’s not allowed.
-I should be able to speak to my-- -Listen to me.
You’re violating your agreement.
Agreement?
-You call again... -Why are you--
...I’ll press charges.
Well, this is--
Joe’s such a bad boy.
translation.de: Joe ist so ein böser Bube.

translation.en: -[man] Sucker. -[Joe] Sorry. Sorry.
Joe motherfuckin’ Denton.
-Shit. Scotty. Look at you. -Look at you.
translation.de: -Shit, Scotty. Sieh dich an. -Sieh dich an.

translation.en: Goddamn. It’s good to see you.
Uh, get one, and put that on mine.
translation.de: Schenk mir einen ein, und der geht auf mich.

translation.en: -That’s kind of you, man. Cheers. -Oh, it’s the least I can do.
translation.de: -Das ist nett. Prost. -Das ist das Mindeste.

translation.en: It’s the least I can do, man.
I figure you and Billy were-- you were like brothers,
translation.de: Du und Billy wart... ...wie Brüder, also sind wir das auch...

translation.en: so that makes us like brothers, so...
translation.de: ...wie Brüder, also sind wir das auch...

translation.en: -Hey. -To bein’ home.
And to my brother Billy.
To home and to Billy.
I-- I just-- I wanted to say hey, welcome you back.
translation.de: Ich... wollte dich nur willkommen heißen.

translation.en: If you need anything...
-Thanks, man. Good to see ya. -Give me a call.
You know, I come in here a lot,
and I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen you before.
translation.de: aber dich habe ich noch nie gesehen.

translation.en: I’m new.
-New used, maybe. -Mm-hmm.
But it’s what’s under the hood that counts. -Yep. -Right?
translation.de: Die PS stecken unter der Haube. Stimmt’s?

translation.en: Not the paint job. The ride is just so--
translation.de: Nicht der Lack. -Die Fahrt ist... -Verstehe. Autos.

translation.en: I get it. Cars.
Enjoyable.
Do you, uh...
wanna buy me a Sucker Punch?
Oh, boy.
I don’t know what that is.
Drinks.
-[woman] Now what? -[laughs]
No. No.
No, I, uh-- I gotta go home.
translation.de: Nein, ich... ich muss nach Hause.

translation.en: Are you sure?
That’s boring. Wanna give me a ride home at least?
translation.de: Langweilig. Fährst du mich wenigstens nach Hause?

translation.en: Please.
Pretty please?
Pretty, pretty please?
[Joe] You sure this is the right way?
Yeah. It’s, uh, straight down there.
It’s right over there.
You know...
...I thought you were gonna try something with me.
-I’m just giving you a lift. -Hmm.
You didn’t ask my name.
What’s your name?
-[thunder rumbling] -Cara.
Cara Coakley, you motherfucker.
Help! Somebody help me!
Coffee?
I’d say it’s good to see you again, but I feel sick just being this close.
translation.de: Meine Freude, dich wiederzusehen, hält sich in Grenzen.

translation.en: -Nice to see you too, Dan. -Lieutenant Pleasant.
Don’t you dare use the informal with me, you fucking degenerate.
translation.de: Duz mich nicht, du verdammter Irrer,

translation.en: You’re an everlasting disgrace to this department,
and if Officer Barnett wasn’t here,
I would tune you up myself on general principle.
translation.de: würde ich mir dich höchstpersönlich vorknöpfen.

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
Did Manny Vassey or any of his animals visit you inside?
translation.de: Hat Manny Vassey oder eines dieser Tiere dich im Knast besucht?

translation.en: Was it worth it, selling your soul to them?
translation.de: Lohnte es sich, ihnen die Seele zu verkaufen?

translation.en: You Judas fuck.
Where’s the DA?
Isn’t he coming?
Look, Phil, this is not how I want--
translation.de: Hören Sie, Phil, ich wollte nicht...

translation.en: One of those young men is in intensive care.
The one with the nunchakus?
His father is an alderman.
I don’t give a shit if they’re astronauts.
Charge me.
Put those assholes on the stand and watch ’em come apart like wet bread,
translation.de: Zitieren Sie die Arschlöcher in den Zeugenstand, und sie zerbröseln.

translation.en: because you know exactly what this is.
translation.de: Sie wissen doch genau, was das war.

translation.en: They’re parked in the middle of nowhere with ninja weapons,
translation.de: Sie parken mit Ninja-Waffen mitten im Nichts,

translation.en: precisely where and when their girlfriend happens to get assaulted?
translation.de: genau dann und da, wo ihre Freundin überfallen wird?

translation.en: Come on. Be serious.
Now, your daughter built herself a cute little frame,
translation.de: Ihre Tochter hat eine nette Falle ausgeheckt,

translation.en: but there’s no way this ends in anything but a civil suit that buys me your fucking house.
translation.de: aber diese Chose endet als Zivilklage, die mir Ihre Gunst einträgt.

translation.en: [Phil] You’re right.
I spoke with Cara just now. She’s, uh, quite shaken by what happened.
translation.de: Cara sagte mir eben, dass sie der Vorfall sehr aufgewühlt hat.

translation.en: She’s been, uh, angry lately.
translation.de: Sie ist in letzter Zeit... sehr wütend.

translation.en: She, uh...
Do you wish to press charges?
In light of the statement given by my--
Cara,
regarding the events of this evening...
you have the right to press criminal battery charges
against the men who attacked you,
translation.de: Anklage gegen Ihre Angreifer zu erheben...

translation.en: -and my office will issue arrest warrants. -[Joe] Hmm.
Ah, forget it. It’s in the past.
If I could change what happened, I would.
translation.de: Wenn ich die Dinge ändern könnte, würde ich es tun.

translation.en: But I paid my time.
I just want everything to stay in the past.
Like you want Billy Caldwell to stay in the past?
You’re batting zero, shithead.
Goddamn, I miss high school.
I just passed a kid in the lot molesting his girlfriend
translation.de: Ich kam gerade an einem Jungen vorbei, der sein Mädel

translation.en: in the backseat of his ’82 Datsun.
Kind of impressed that Phil’s kid went for hard stuff like that.
translation.de: Die Nummer von Phils Tochter wundert mich.

translation.en: She always seemed like kind of a flake to me.
But then the mother did leave after the, uh-- [whooshing]
translation.de: Doch dann verschwand die Mutter nach dem...

translation.en: So that’s gotta be kind of rough.
You look like you lost a little weight. Usually all that starchy food they--
translation.de: Du siehst mager aus. -Sonst führt das Knastessen... -Was ist los, Dan?

translation.en: What’s up, Dan?
translation.de: -Sonst führt das Knastessen... -Was ist los, Dan?

translation.en: How’s that for manners after all I’ve done for you?
translation.de: Benimm dich, du schuldest mir etwas.

translation.en: Six years in county beats 12 years in the state house.
translation.de: Lieber sechs Jahre im County als 12 im Staatsgefängnis.

translation.en: Those boys down there would’ve spread you out like my crazy aunt’s quilt.
translation.de: Die Jungs dort hätten dich plattgemacht.

translation.en: Yeah, that was Manny’s grease, not yours.
translation.de: Ja, das verdanke ich Manny, nicht dir.

translation.en: -Speaking of the king... -[can hits bench]
-I didn’t ask for this. -So give it back.
translation.de: Darum hatte ich nicht gebeten. Dann gib es zurück.

translation.en: You heard about Manny?
What?
Cancer.
In the butt. Matter of time now.
Well, he had a good run. Junior can steer things now.
translation.de: Er hatte ein gutes Leben. Junior kann übernehmen.

translation.en: Nothin’ to do with me.
-Clean slate, huh? -Oh, yeah.
Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re on the hook here, Joey.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, aber ich fürchte, du sitzt in der Patsche, Joey.

translation.en: Manny’s gotta go.
You--
You said cancer.
Before then. Now. Yesterday.
Fuck are you talking about?
That old-time religion.
Old man’s found God.
Cravin’ salvation by way of confession.
Bullshit. He’d never flip.
Old Manny wouldn’t, but dying’s made him smaller.
translation.de: Der alte Manny nicht, aber das Sterben hat ihn reduziert.

translation.en: So let’s consider now specifically the kinds of things that he might confess to.
translation.de: Denken wir mal an all die Dinge, die er beichten könnte,

translation.en: Say, vis-à-vis, you.
Yeah. Now you’re seein’ it.
You think Phil’s comment about Bill Caldwell was coincidental?
translation.de: Dass Phil Caldwell erwähnte, war kein Zufall.

translation.en: -Manny’s talking to Phil? -Crazy, right?
First he wants Phil hit, then his asshole’s melting
translation.de: Erst will er Phil Böses, dann wird er krank

translation.en: and he wants to give him absolution.
Christ forgives. The sinner is saved. All of that.
translation.de: Christus vergibt. Der Sünder ist gerettet und so.

translation.en: Phil’s nudging him towards a deposition, and if he lives long enough, a grand jury.
translation.de: Phil drängt ihn zu einer Aussage und, wenn er durchhält, zur Grand Jury.

translation.en: But even if not, you’d be inside so fast, your bunk would still be warm.
translation.de: Aber selbst wenn nicht, wärst du ratzfatz wieder drin.

translation.en: And no favors this time.
What do we do?
“We”? You got a turd in your pocket?
You know, Phil’s been trying to butt-fuck you since forever,
translation.de: Phil versucht, dich seit jeher dranzukriegen.

translation.en: and if Manny sings, he can do it.
And if you do get keistered, I’d worry I’m next in line, and let me tell you what ain’t gonna happen.
translation.de: Und dann bin ich der Nächste, was nicht passieren wird.

translation.en: If I was gonna roll over, wouldn’t I do that before serving my fucking time?
translation.de: Hätte ich aufgegeben, dann doch wohl vor der Haftstrafe, oder?

translation.en: -I did the job they wanted-- -No, half the job. Semantics.
translation.de: -Ich tat, was sie verlangten... -Nein, die Hälfte.

translation.en: -Fuck you. I took the fall. -[engine starts]
You be sure and send her some flowers now, son.
translation.de: Vergiss nicht, ihr Blumen zu schicken.

translation.en: The point is, you left Phil breathing all those years ago,
translation.de: Hättest du Phil vor Jahren nicht leben lassen,

translation.en: or it wouldn’t be a problem now.
The way I see it, it’s your mess.
But hey, I’m more into carrots than sticks, so...
translation.de: Aber ich glaube an Zuckerbrot und Peitsche.

translation.en: let’s talk about your girls instead.
translation.de: Lass uns also über deine Mädchen reden.

translation.en: Junior high by now, hmm?
Family court judge by the name of Winthrop
found himself “over-served” one evening a while back.
translation.de: saß vor einer Weile betrunken am Steuer.

translation.en: And he dented up the front of his Prius with the skull of an address-free citizen.
translation.de: Der Schädel eines Obdachlosen beulte ihm seinen Prius ein.

translation.en: You might say I helped him sweep that up.
And I know that he would fall all over himself doing me a favor in return.
translation.de: und weiß, dass er alles tun würde, um diesen Gefallen zu erwidern.

translation.en: Like revising your custody deal, for instance,
so you can see your daughters again.
What am I thinking? I gotta drive.
translation.de: Was soll das? Ich muss fahren.

translation.en: Manny goes. You get your girls back. That’s the carrot.
translation.de: Manny weg, Töchter da. Das ist das Zuckerbrot.

translation.en: The stick? Who wants to think about that?
translation.de: Die Peitsche? Wer will das wissen?

translation.en: Do it fast.
Answer me on that if I call.
-Don’t make me come after you. -[engine starts]
He lives.
Oh, I guess you needed the rest. That’s okay.
translation.de: Du musstest wohl Schlaf nachholen. Ist ok.

translation.en: -Is that a bruise? -Oh, no.
That was there already. From a door.
translation.de: Der ist alt. Von einer Tür.

translation.en: -You need a hand? -Nah. Makin’ soup.
[Joe groans] Hard time sleeping.
-Well, this is a big adjustment. -Mmm.
Give it time.
I’m sorry I wasn’t here when you arrived. I--
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich nicht da war. Ich...

translation.en: -I, uh-- I already told him. -It’s okay. It’s okay. [groans]
translation.de: Ich... habe es erklärt. Ist schon gut.

translation.en: -Got our wires crossed, I guess. -Hmm.
-What are your-- -Dad says--
-Sorry. Go ahead. -No, no, you first.
I was just wondering what are your plans for work.
[Joe] I haven’t been home a day yet.
translation.de: Ich bin erst einen Tag zu Hause.

translation.en: It’s a reasonable question.
Your first night home and you’re out till dawn
translation.de: In der ersten Nacht bist du bis in die Puppen

translation.en: with your father’s truck.
I just don’t want things going back to how they were.
translation.de: Ich will einfach nicht, dass du in alte Muster zurückfällst.

translation.en: Not here.
Dad says you don’t speak to your grandchildren.
translation.de: Dad sagt, ihr seht eure Enkelinnen nicht.

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] That’s Elaine’s decision.
We just want what’s best for them.
translation.de: Wir wollen nur das Beste für sie.

translation.en: What about me?
It’s impossible to you that I might have changed?
translation.de: Ist es so unvorstellbar, dass ich mich geändert habe?

translation.en: You know...
every Sunday in church...
I have to see Phil Coakley.
And everybody there sees me seeing him.
Have you ever thought what that might feel like... to me?
translation.de: Hast du dir jemals Gedanken gemacht, wie sich das anfühlt... für mich?

translation.en: Have you changed?
You know what this is?
You expect me to be impressed ’cause you didn’t drink in jail?
translation.de: Ich soll dich loben, weil du nicht getrunken hast?

translation.en: Dad! Come on!
Look, see, this is complicated.
No, it’s not.
You say you’ve changed. Good. I hope it’s true.
translation.de: Du hast dich geändert? Gut. Hoffentlich.

translation.en: I’ve prayed for it long enough.
translation.de: Ich habe lange genug dafür gebetet.

translation.en: I’m happy you’re home, and I love you,
translation.de: Ich freue mich, dass du da bist, und liebe dich...

translation.en: but you don’t get extra points for doing what’s simply required,
translation.de: ...aber du bekommst kein Lob für Selbstverständlichkeiten,

translation.en: what everybody else does.
-I can’t believe this shit. -You have work to do, Joe!
translation.de: -Nicht zu fassen. -Du hast Arbeit vor dir, Joe!

translation.en: I am profoundly sorry, Phil.
translation.de: Es tut mir wahnsinnig leid, Phil.

translation.en: Bill Caldwell. Billy was my friend.
translation.de: Bill Caldwell. Billy war mein Freund.

translation.en: And I just wish he’d-- he’d...
worked the steps.
I was out of line, the way I spoke to you last night.
translation.de: Ich wollte gestern Nacht nicht so mit Ihnen reden.

translation.en: I thought about this a lot,
what I wanted to say to you when I finally saw you,
translation.de: was ich sagen würde, wenn wir uns wiedersehen...

translation.en: and that wasn’t it.
What I did wanna say was that I am profoundly sorry.
translation.de: Ich wollte Ihnen eigentlich sagen, dass es mir wahnsinnig leidtut.

translation.en: I was truly in fear for my life.
I felt I was defending myself,
translation.de: Es fühlte sich wie reine Notwehr an,

translation.en: but that doesn’t excuse the--
I don’t even remember it. Insane.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich nicht mal. Verrückt.

translation.en: -Which is it? -Which?
You were in fear for your life or you don’t remember.
translation.de: Hatten Sie Todesangst, oder erinnern Sie sich nicht?

translation.en: Which is it?
The point is, I do take responsibility,
and I’m ready to move ahead with a-- with a clean life, a good life.
Take responsibility and just--
You know. Amends.
You mentioned Bill Caldwell.
He was my friend. I loved him.
translation.de: Er war mein Freund. Ich habe ihn geliebt.

translation.en: I just wish he’d gotten into the program like I have,
translation.de: Ich wünschte, er hätte sich wie ich auf das Programm

translation.en: worked the steps.
There’s a whole other world you can live in. He just didn’t know.
translation.de: Es ist eine ganz andere Welt, die er nicht kannte.

translation.en: You are within 100 yards of my home here.
translation.de: Sie haben sich meinem Haus genähert.

translation.en: But I’m not interested in some chickenshit restraining order violation.
translation.de: Aber ich scheiße auf eine sinnlose Kontaktverbotsanzeige.

translation.en: For you, I want the needle.
translation.de: Für Sie will ich die Giftspritze.

translation.en: -And I’m gonna get it. -Okay.
“Anger eats the vessel.”
[man] I guess you heard, huh?
How’s he doing?
Can I, um--?
He took care of me in there.
You’re on the same drugs as me.
translation.de: Du nimmst dieselben Drogen wie ich.

translation.en: -How you feeling? -Eh.
I’m working on my anger.
-What? -Oh, nothing.
That’s not something I thought I’d ever hear you say.
translation.de: Es überrascht mich nur aus deinem Munde.

translation.en: [chuckles] What’d it ever get me?
All this. Lots of things.
Yeah, well, I don’t want ’em anymore.
Dan gave me a bag.
translation.de: Dan hat mir eine Tüte gegeben.

translation.en: -You did your bid. -Yeah.
But I blew the job.
And I warned you about the drinking and the drugs.
translation.de: Ich habe dich vorm Saufen und den Drogen gewarnt.

translation.en: You did.
I should’ve listened, but since I didn’t...
translation.de: Ich hätte auf dich hören sollen, aber nein.

translation.en: I guess I was expecting someone to clip me in there, -not pay me when I came out. -[laughs]
translation.de: Darum hatte ich eher mit meiner Ermordung als mit Bezahlung gerechnet.

translation.en: If you knew how much it cost
translation.de: Wenn du wüsstest, wie viel es kostet,

translation.en: to sell that imperfect self-defense line. [laughs]
translation.de: diese obskure Notwehrlinie glaubwürdig zu verkaufen.

translation.en: Manny, come on.
Yeah, I admit.
I was angry about Phil.
You blew our clean shot at him. Hmm.
translation.de: Wir hatten ihn klar im Visier.

translation.en: But since you’d already taken care of Billy...
translation.de: Aber da du Billy schon ausgeschaltet hattest...

translation.en: even though he went over to them...
he was your boy.
So that meant something.
I bet Junior disagreed, huh?
Yeah, well, Junior has a lot of--
a lot of different ideas about a lot of things.
Funny you mention talking to Phil.
-Give me that fuckin’ thing. I hurt. -In a sec.
Because what I hear,
there’s this notion floating now that maybe Billy wasn’t an accident.
translation.de: dass das Gerücht umgeht, das mit Billy sei kein Unfall gewesen.

translation.en: -There’s always talk. -Manny.
Are you talking to the DA? Huh?
translation.de: Sprichst du etwa mit dem Staatsanwalt?

translation.en: You know, sometimes when I’m sleeping...
translation.de: Weißt du, manchmal, wenn ich schlafe...

translation.en: I think I see what hell looks like...
and it ain’t fire and it ain’t devils.
translation.de: Und da ist kein Feuer oder der Teufel.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It’s just me.
And I ain’t no goddamn stool pigeon.
I’m sorry.
I don’t know. I...
It’s been a tough few days, is all.
[Manny] Tough, yeah.
Tough for everybody.
[Joe] He nodded out. Pressed the thing there and just...
translation.de: Er ist eingenickt. Ich habe das Ding gedrückt...

translation.en: It’s the pain. We upped the dosage.
translation.de: Die Schmerzen. Die Dosis wurde erhöht.

translation.en: We should probably let him rest.
Of course. Of course.
I’m Joe.
Old friend.
So how is he-- I mean, it’s bad, huh?
translation.de: Wie geht’s ihm? Ich meine, schlimm, was?

translation.en: I’m a hospice worker.
Yeah, well, he’s a fighter.
Thank you for taking care of my friend.
translation.de: Danke, dass Sie sich um ihn kümmern.

translation.en: You’re gonna sit there with your stupid fuckin’ shirt and tell me I can’t see my own father?
translation.de: In diesem albernen Hemd verweigerst du mir Zutritt?

translation.en: My kids can’t go?
He just wants you to call first, Junior, that’s all.
translation.de: Er will, dass du vorher anrufst, Junior.

translation.en: Oh, I see.
Did this cocksucker call first?
-[boy] I thought we were gonna see Poppy. -[Joe] Wow.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir könnten zu Opa.

translation.en: [Junior] Go inside and play the quiet game, okay?
translation.de: Geht rein, aber seid ruhig, ok?

translation.en: Oh, man. You guys are so big.
translation.de: Mann, deine Jungs sind groß geworden.

translation.en: [Junior] Hey, close that door behind you. The A/C’s on, all right?
translation.de: Hey, Tür zu. Die Klimaanlage läuft.

translation.en: -Goddamn, they grow so fast. -Yeah, how you doin’, Joe?
Now, you lay there with your hands on your scrotum and you listen.
translation.de: Lass deine Hand an den Eiern, und hör mir zu.

translation.en: You are not welcome here.
This is a family time,
and this family no longer has any use for dumb-fuck, grief-causing policemen.
translation.de: Und wir brauchen keine blöden Polizisten mehr, die uns Probleme bereiten.

translation.en: Now, you come around here again bothering my father,
translation.de: Wenn du noch mal bei meinem Vater aufkreuzt...

translation.en: disturbing his rest...
and I’m gonna bring you down to my playroom.
Yeah. You know what happens there.
translation.de: Ja. Du weißt, was da passiert.

translation.en: -All right. Come on. Let’s get up. -[groaning]
I think we’d all feel better if you moved on.
translation.de: Es wäre toll, wenn du weiterzögest.

translation.en: Any idea what Phil Coakley talks to your dad about?
translation.de: Weißt du, worüber dein Vater mit Phil Coakley spricht?

translation.en: Besides the Bible, I mean.
translation.de: Außer über die Bibel, meine ich.

translation.en: Now, why would you say something like that?
translation.de: Wo kommt das denn jetzt her?

translation.en: I mean, all these years my father carries your crazy ass,
translation.de: Nach all den Jahren, die mein Vater dich beschützt hat,

translation.en: you’re implying he’s some kind of rat or something?
translation.de: Nach all den Jahren, die mein Vater dich beschützt hat, nennst du ihn einen Verräter?

translation.en: All right. Yo, break this motherfucker’s mouth.
translation.de: Alles klar. Brecht ihm den Kiefer.

translation.en: Uh, can I have a coffee, please?
Thank you.
Hello.
Here.
Thank you.
No, thank you for taking care of my friend.
You said that already.
Are you from Bradley originally?
I moved from Montreal around two years ago.
translation.de: Ich bin vor zwei Jahren aus Montreal hergezogen.

translation.en: -You got family? -No.
I-- Well, uh, no.
Do you work there every day at Manny’s house?
translation.de: Sind Sie jeden Tag bei Manny?

translation.en: -Six days a week usually. -Hmm. Wow.
And all of his-- I don’t know--
uh, medication and monitoring and all that, that’s all you?
translation.de: All die... na ja... ...Medikamente, Überwachung machen Sie?

translation.en: That’s me.
And another girl. We do split shifts.
Wow. That must feel like a big responsibility.
I guess it is. I don’t feel overwhelmed.
translation.de: Ja, aber ich fühle mich nicht überfordert.

translation.en: No?
But I’m good at helping people.
I guess your agency provides you
with supplies and medication and whatnot for there at the house.
translation.de: Ihr Dienst stattet Sie sicher mit allem nötigen Material und Medikamenten aus, oder?

translation.en: My father had lymphoma.
And... [sighs]
They had him on so much different stuff there.
At the end...
he didn’t know what day it was.
-I’m sorry. It’s a terrible disease. -Yeah.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Eine schlimme Krankheit.

translation.en: Actually, I just moved back here myself.
Everyone’s gone now.
I was, uh, doing some consulting--
-What the fuck? -Sergeant Thom Doyle,
retired, IUPA local.
And you, sir, are a worthless goddamn punk.
translation.de: Und Sie, Sir, sind ein wertloser Dreckskerl.

translation.en: I think I’m gonna skip this one.
Do you think you might wanna get together again?
translation.de: Möchten Sie sich vielleicht wieder mit mir treffen?

translation.en: Like I said, everyone’s gone now, and...
translation.de: Wie gesagt, alle sind weg, und...

translation.en: I like you.
You know, if you want, I could set you up with Toni.
translation.de: Wenn du möchtest, kannst du Toni haben.

translation.en: Little, uh, welcome-home toss?
You know we take care of cops here.
Bring that pussy over here, girl. Yeah.
Hell, your old buddy, he’s on a weekly.
translation.de: Dein alter Kumpel kommt jede Woche her.

translation.en: [man] Come on. Come on. What’s wrong? Hey!
translation.de: Na los. Was ist los? Hey!

translation.en: Bruno. Fuck. Get that fucker out of here.
translation.de: Bruno, wirf das Arschloch hier raus.

translation.en: All right, come on.
Get the fuck out.
-Who’s the peacock? -It’s her old man.
They got this whole jealousy thing going.
translation.de: Das alte Lied von der Eifersucht.

translation.en: Anyway, if you wanna spend some time with Toni, it’s on me.
translation.de: Wenn du Toni willst, geht das auf mich.

translation.en: -Pass. -Suit yourself.
Hey, you want any, uh--? [snorts]
Oh, no, thanks.
[man on TV] Marion Barry tonight delegated many of his duties
as mayor of the nation’s capital but did not resign.
translation.de: als Bürgermeister der Hauptstadt, trat aber nicht zurück.

translation.en: The word of this came hours
after the DC mayor was brought before a federal magistrate--
translation.de: nachdem der Bürgermeister von Washington vor Gericht...

translation.en: Excuse me.
That is not your vehicle.
Oh, Dad-- Dad said it was fine.
Where have you been all day? And why are you rushing in like this?
translation.de: Wo warst du, und warum so eilig?

translation.en: For your information, I went to a meeting.
translation.de: Zu deiner Information, ich war bei einem Treffen.

translation.en: -Where? -What?
Where was the meeting you were at?
I-- It’s anonymous, Mom.
We’re not gonna do things like this. I’m telling you right now.
translation.de: So läuft das nicht, das sage ich dir.

translation.en: -I’m doing everything I can! -All right, okay.
translation.de: -Ich tue, was ich kann! -Ist gut, ok.

translation.en: I wish I could believe you, Joe, but you make it so hard.
translation.de: Ich will dir glauben, aber du machst es mir schwer.

translation.en: No. You make it so hard, because you don’t want to believe in me.
translation.de: Nein, du willst einfach nicht an mich glauben.

translation.en: I said “believe,” not “believe in.”
translation.de: Ich sagte “dir glauben”, nicht “an dich glauben”.

translation.en: -[Joe] See? -Now, listen.
The onus is on you.
What difference does it make when you’re determined to judge me?
translation.de: Du stehst in der Pflicht. Wozu? Du verurteilst mich sowieso.

translation.en: Could I have some support here, please?
Oh, no, wait, wait. Mom.
Fuck it. I’ll be gone soon anyway.
What’s that supposed to mean?
This behavior is precisely why you lost your family, Joseph!
translation.de: Dieses Verhalten hat dich deine Familie gekostet, Joseph!

translation.en: -Would you like another one? -No, thanks.
What?
Thank you.
For asking me here.
I don’t usually-- And... [sighs]
Feels nice.
Like I said, I like you.
Me too.
So, Montreal.
What prompted the move south?
Polarity.
[clears throat] Weather systems.
-Why does anyone do anything? -I don’t know.
Do you ever feel like you’re living in the wrong skin?
translation.de: Kamst du dir je fremd vor?

translation.en: Sometimes I’ll wake up in the middle of the night
and I’ll go to get a glass of water,
translation.de: Manchmal wache ich nachts auf, hole mir ein Glas Wasser,

translation.en: and I’ll just catch myself in the mirror, and I don’t recognize myself at all.
translation.de: sehe mich im Spiegel und erkenne mich selbst nicht wieder.

translation.en: It’s like someone else has come into my bathroom and just stood there.
translation.de: So als stünde jemand anders in meinem Bad.

translation.en: Does that ever happen to you?
Sure.
-[salsa playing] -Do you--?
I-- [clears throat] I’m just gonna go...
Do you-- Do you want a drink or something?
Okay. And you?
Yes.
Just...
I like your place.
It’s what I have.
-Cheers. -[clinking]
Why me?
’Cause you’re good.
[Joe] I think everything happens for a reason, you know?
translation.de: Ich glaube, dass alles einen Grund hat.

translation.en: Like what?
Meeting you.
-[chuckles] -No, really. I--
I’ve been having kind of a hard time.
translation.de: Ich habe eine schwere Zeit durchgemacht.

translation.en: Just alone, you know?
Things... just f-feel different now.
translation.de: Jetzt... fühlt sich alles anders an.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Hope that’s not weird to say.
[sighs] Anyways, so, yeah.
Do you have any other clients?
Other than Manny, I mean.
I noticed you had, I don’t know, looked like, uh...
translation.de: Ich habe bemerkt, dass Arzneimittel im Kühlschrank stehen.

translation.en: -[sighs] -...pharmaceuticals or something in there.
The reason I ask is because, before I moved back,
translation.de: Ich frage deshalb, weil, bevor ich wieder umgezogen bin,

translation.en: one of the firms I was consulting for had this guy--
Oh, Joe.
No, it’s true. He was-- Really--
Really? “Consulting”?
You were in jail.
It was in the paper.
Your picture was in the paper.
“Slash Cop,” it said, which just is...
What happened?
[sighs] Didn’t you read it?
I’m asking you.
I was very drunk. Um--
Coming home from a place downtown.
Apparently I bumped into him, the lawyer.
translation.de: Offenbar bin ich diesem Staatsanwalt begegnet.

translation.en: And, uh--
There was a fight, and I hurt him. Badly.
-It said you had a knife. -I thought he was gonna--
It was dark, and I-I-I, um--
If you knew...
Because I know what it means to need a second chance.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was es heißt, eine zweite Chance zu brauchen.

translation.en: And I didn’t know you when you did those things.
I know you now.
-[phone beeps] -Hello?
[Dan on phone] Didn’t wake your girl, did I?
I was hoping I would’ve heard some sort of “In Memoriam” item by now
translation.de: Ich hatte gehofft, irgendwo einen Nachruf zu lesen.

translation.en: about our mutual patron.
I fucking tried. Junior was there.
translation.de: Ich hab’s versucht, aber Junior war da.

translation.en: -Whoa. -Yeah, exactly.
I can’t get that close again.
If anything other than cancer happens to Manny, I’ll be the first one he comes after.
translation.de: Stirbt Manny nicht an Krebs, bin ich als Erster dran.

translation.en: Figure it out. [exhales]
Put in some work instead of gettin’ your dick wet.
I was working. She’s the nurse there.
translation.de: Tu ich doch. Sie ist seine Pflegerin.

translation.en: -Oh. Good thinkin’. -Yeah. Except that won’t work either.
-Why not? -It just... won’t.
There’s no access. Trust me.
[sighs] All that matters is that there isn’t a case brought against you.
translation.de: Was zählt, ist, dass du nicht angeklagt wirst.

translation.en: Phil is the only one eager to throw bombs,
translation.de: Phil ist heiß auf einen Knüller,

translation.en: and everybody else knows that the Vasseys are good for business.
translation.de: und wir wissen, dass die Vasseys immer mitmischen.

translation.en: So if you can’t clip Manny, clip the mutant.
translation.de: Wenn du Manny nicht ausschalten kannst, dann den Mutanten.

translation.en: There’s no time left. Just make it look right, is all.
translation.de: Es bleibt keine Zeit. Verwisch nur alle Spuren gut.

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] Joe! Pick up the phone. It’s for you.
translation.de: Joe! Geh ans Telefon. Es ist für dich.

translation.en: Joe! Joe!
-Yeah. -[man on phone] Joseph Denton?
-Yeah. -This is Anthony Getman with the Bradley Post-Release Program.
You have your office check-in and urinalysis appointment today.
translation.de: Sie müssen heute eine Urinprobe abgeben.

translation.en: -[sniffs] -Hello?
Yes, sir. I’ll be right there.
Fuck.
-[Scotty] Hello? -It’s Joe.
-I need your help. -Who is it?
-Oh, hey, man. Come on up. -[door buzzes]
[Scotty] Seriously, Joe, it’s no problem.
Positive?
The, uh, reserves piss test randomly, so I, uh...
stick to booze.
-You can keep the cup. [chuckles] -[chuckling]
-Thanks, man. I owe ya. -No.
Hey, Joe, can I ask you something straight up?
translation.de: Joe, darf ich dich etwas fragen?

translation.en: Sure.
Back then was there ever any, uh--
I don’t know--
any talk about what happened to Billy maybe wasn’t an accident?
translation.de: gab es Gerüchte, dass das mit Billy kein Unfall war?

translation.en: I mean,
we all know he was a lush, but falling asleep on the tracks?
translation.de: er war Trinker, aber auf den Gleisen einzuschlafen?

translation.en: Wasn’t my case, but I knew the guys who drew it. They worked it right.
translation.de: Diejenigen, die den Fall bearbeitet haben, waren gründlich.

translation.en: Why, um...
Why now?
Phil Coakley called me. He wants me to come in.
translation.de: Phil Coakley hat mich zu sich zitiert.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. He say why?
He said they’re gonna impanel a grand jury and, uh, reopen it as a homicide.
translation.de: Sie wollen eine Grand Jury zusammenstellen und es als Mordfall neu aufrollen.

translation.en: Based on what?
“New information” is all he would say.
translation.de: “Neue Informationen”, mehr hat er nicht gesagt.

translation.en: It’s like he wanted to dangle it in front of my face.
translation.de: Als würde er mir einen Köder vorwerfen.

translation.en: Fuckin’ prick.
Whatever Phil says he’s got, it’s smoke. He’s fishing.
translation.de: Phil redet viel heiße Luft und fischt im Trüben.

translation.en: He’s got a hard-on for the Vasseys. Always has.
translation.de: Er hat etwas gegen die Vasseys. Schon immer.

translation.en: There was talk about Junior, maybe he’d been around the tracks that night.
translation.de: Es hieß, dass sich Junior damals bei den Gleisen herumgetrieben hat.

translation.en: But they could never back it up. It was what it was.
translation.de: Aber dafür gab es nie Beweise.

translation.en: A shitty accident, like you said.
I’m sorry, man.
I never liked Phil anyway.
I was glad when you fucked him up.
translation.de: Gut, dass du ihn entstellt hast.

translation.en: Thanks, man. All right.
Hey, buddy.
-Hey, fellas! -Hey, Dan!
Yeah, now he gets it.
Get it all out.
Up you go. Come on.
This thing works pretty good, huh?
Now, I didn’t wake up in this mood.
translation.de: Heute früh war ich besser drauf.

translation.en: I was thinking, “Don’t worry. My pal Joey will carry his water on this thing.”
translation.de: Ich dachte: “Keine Sorge, Joey wird’s schon richten.”

translation.en: But then I hear, uh, no.
This Caldwell grand jury is, uh, in motion after all.
-I know. -Did I tell you time was short?
Did I tell you what was coming? And what did you do but fuck around.
translation.de: Habe ich dich nicht gewarnt? Aber du vögelst nur herum.

translation.en: I’ll just take my chances in court.
Buddy, you know I wouldn’t be able to let you do that.
translation.de: Du weißt, dass ich das nicht zulasse.

translation.en: Then I’ll run.
Well, that either. Do I need to recharge your battery?
translation.de: Das auch nicht. Muss ich nachladen?

translation.en: F-Fu-- I can’t do Manny. I can’t do Phil.
translation.de: Manny geht nicht. Phil auch nicht.

translation.en: You name a third way or get the fuck out.
translation.de: Nenn mir einen Dritten oder raus.

translation.en: I just bought a new gas grill.
Stainless steel. Got an infrared system on it.
To be honest, I don’t even know what that means.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht mal, was das heißt.

translation.en: But if you think that I wouldn’t buy some crackhead nigger
translation.de: Aber wenn du glaubst, dass ich einem Cracksüchtigen

translation.en: for 500 bucks to come into your parents’ house
and slit their throat while they sleep...
if it meant that I got to keep that grill, you got me mixed up with somebody else.
translation.de: ...damit ich den Grill behalten kann, dann kennst du mich schlecht.

translation.en: Manny’s deposition is Monday morning.
Thirty-six hours.
Now, you fix it before then, or I’ll assume that we’re at odds.
translation.de: Find bis dahin eine Lösung, oder wir liegen im Clinch.

translation.en: And then-- [huffs] goddamn, everything’s on the table.
And I really do like your folks.
[Joe] Hey, it’s me.
Hey, hey, hey. How you feelin’ today?
Do you know, I was thinking maybe I’d want to talk to Toni.
translation.de: Ich würde doch gern mit Toni sprechen.

translation.en: -You mentioned preferentials. -Yeah.
So you know when she sees Dan then?
translation.de: Weißt du, wann sie Dan trifft?

translation.en: Or-- Or where?
Dan? I never mentioned Dan.
translation.de: Dan? Den habe ich nie erwähnt.

translation.en: I was talking about Phil Coakley.
How else do you think that Frankenstein motherfucker’s getting any pussy?
translation.de: Wie sollte Frankenstein sonst zu Sex kommen?

translation.en: [Joe] Where’d you meet him?
[Toni] English Garden Inn, off 68.
Same room or different room?
He had a retainer on number 27, on account of it’s a queen size.
translation.de: Immer Nummer 27, wegen des extragroßen Bettes.

translation.en: -Can you get him to see you again? -I don’t wanna see him.
translation.de: Kannst du ein Treffen arrangieren? Ich will es nicht.

translation.en: A grand.
Thousand dollars?
Cash. After.
[Joe] I think I can do it.
[Dan on phone] Good boy. Which one?
Neither.
I got a way to freeze Phil out. Nobody gets hurt.
translation.de: Ich knöpf mir Phil vor. Keiner nimmt Schaden.

translation.en: Oh, girl, did I knock a fuse loose?
I can back him off. No grand jury, no Manny Vassey. It’s done.
translation.de: Ich schalte ihn aus. Keine Grand Jury, kein Manny Vassey.

translation.en: You must have a hell of a wedge.
Bradley’s most saintly public official. Solicitation, on tape.
translation.de: Bradleys Vorzeigebeamter. Mit einer Prostituierten, auf Video.

translation.en: Ha! Is that real?
I’m looking at it.
I’ll be goddamned.
Phil’s still got some gas in his tank after all.
translation.de: Phils Waffen sind doch noch scharf.

translation.en: He is mighty precious about his reputation,
but, still, blackmail’s messy, you ain’t careful.
Nobody dies, Dan. It’s clean.
translation.de: Niemand stirbt, Dan. Es ist sauber.

translation.en: So long as it’s chilled.
It will be.
That’s my boy.
Thanks.
You seem different.
How’s that?
I don’t know.
Lighter.
Things are gonna work out.
Maybe they already have.
I’m gonna have a shower.
All right.
[Toni] I told him I’d see him again if he laid off the Jesus.
translation.de: Ich bot ihm an, ihn wiederzusehen.

translation.en: He damn near jumped through the phone.
translation.de: Er sprang fast durch den Hörer.

translation.en: Great. I’ll be right there.
-[knocking] -I’ll call you tonight!
[Charlotte] What?
[commercial announcer] Taurus is the car you’ve been waiting for.
translation.de: Taurus ist das heiß ersehnte Auto.

translation.en: Sleek, strong, safe.
See the new look Taurus at a dealership near you.
translation.de: Der neue Taurus, bei jedem Autohändler.

translation.en: [TV announcer] And now back to our Friday night presentation.
-[door slams open] -[man] Bitch, I knew it!
Police! Stay in your room!
Shit!
No.
I gotta talk to you.
All right.
I read this while you were inside.
translation.de: Das las ich während deiner Haft.

translation.en: I didn’t know there was a name for it.
translation.de: NARZISSTISCHE PERSÖNLICHKEITSSTÖRUNG Ich kannte den Namen nicht.

translation.en: I have always known since you were little...
translation.de: Seit du klein warst, wusste ich...

translation.en: there was something in you.
And I didn’t do anything about it.
I’ve done a lot of soul-searching...
about my part in what happened to you.
-Dad, you didn’t do anything. -Let me finish.
translation.de: Dad, gar keinen. Lass mich ausreden.

translation.en: That’s what I’m saying.
I didn’t do anything.
I didn’t make you run with wild people.
I didn’t make you gamble all that money.
I didn’t make you take drugs or drink liquor
translation.de: Dich weder an Drogen noch Alkohol herangeführt

translation.en: or be so goddamn angry all the time, Joe.
translation.de: oder dir Grund gegeben, ständig so wütend zu sein, Joe.

translation.en: I knew how you were. I did nothing to help.
translation.de: Ich kannte dich und habe nichts unternommen.

translation.en: I am sorry, Joe.
For that I am truly sorry.
But I’ve gotta do something about it now.
translation.de: Aber jetzt kann ich etwas tun.

translation.en: For your mother, for me...
-[sighs] -...maybe for you.
I don’t know.
But this cannot continue.
translation.de: Aber so kann es nicht weitergehen.

translation.en: Give me the keys.
Give me the keys.
Tomorrow morning.
You’re gonna have to leave.
Dad, I’m leaving right now.
Where is it?
I will not have dirty money in my house.
translation.de: Mir kommt kein schmutziges Geld ins Haus.

translation.en: It’s not dirty money. It’s my money.
Who keeps that much money in a bag unless it’s dirty money?
translation.de: Wer verwahrt so viel Geld in einer Tüte, wenn es nicht schmutzig ist?

translation.en: You have no right to go through my stuff!
translation.de: Ihr habt kein Recht, an meine Sachen zu gehen!

translation.en: We have every right!
Where did it come from? Where?
What’s the difference? I’m leaving! You get your wish!
translation.de: Ich gehe und erfülle euren Wunsch.

translation.en: My wish is to have my son back.
translation.de: Ich wünsche mir meinen Sohn zurück.

translation.en: -All right-- -I don’t know who you are!
-[Joe’s dad] Take it easy, Joe. -Mom.
I’m going. Okay? I’m going.
But I need that bag.
-Mm-mmm. -I am dead without it.
translation.de: Ohne bin ich ein toter Mann.

translation.en: So where is it? Please.
Please.
No. No!
No!
[Joe] What the fuck?
You...
have been in touch this whole time?
The best thing that ever happened to those girls
translation.de: Das Beste, was den Mädchen passieren konnte,

translation.en: was to get away from their father.
[Joe’s mom] Remember, you had everything and you destroyed it all!
translation.de: Erinner dich, du hattest alles, und hast alles zerstört!

translation.en: -[Joe] Fuck you! -[Joe’s dad] Just stop!
[Joe] You’ll never hate me as much as I hate myself!
translation.de: Mehr als ich kann mich niemand hassen!

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] Oh, no, you don’t!
You don’t get to turn this into a little pity party!
translation.de: Hör auf, dich selbst zu bemitleiden!

translation.en: This is beyond your little feelings!
translation.de: Es geht um mehr als deine Gefühle!

translation.en: [Joe] When did you ever care how I felt?
[Joe’s mom] That’s all I ever cared about! And I don’t hate you!
translation.de: Na immer schon! Und ich hasse nicht dich,

translation.en: I hate what you’ve done to this family!
translation.de: sondern was du unserer Familie angetan hast!

translation.en: -Where’s the fucking money? -[gunshot]
[distorted] Joe! 911! Joe, call 911!
-[Joe’s mom] Oh! -Call 911, Joe!
-Oh, Jesus Christ, Joe! -Aaah!
Who did it?
Junior Vassey or-or Dan Pleasant. I don’t know.
translation.de: Junior Vassey oder Dan Pleasant. Ich weiß es nicht.

translation.en: Your friends.
You bring mayhem with you, Joe.
I fucked up.
[Joe] Then what happened was...
I got behind with my bookie.
It started slow, ya know, couple of Sundays of bad luck.
translation.de: Es begann langsam, ein paar Sonntage voller Pech.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I’m underwater.
translation.de: Mir stand das Wasser bis zum Hals.

translation.en: I kept thinking, “Aw, I’ll sort this out.”
[sniffs] “I’ll dig out from this.
My daughters...
when they look at me, when they look at my face, they’ll forgive me.”
translation.de: ...werden mir vergeben, wenn sie mir ins Gesicht sehen.”

translation.en: Me and another cop...
a guy named Dan...
we did whatever Manny said, and he said, “Do terrible things.”
translation.de: ...taten, was Manny sagte, und er sagte: “Tut schreckliche Dinge.”

translation.en: Now it--
It’s happening all over again.
He’s gonna talk about all that now, Manny is, and when he does...
translation.de: Manny will jetzt auspacken, und wenn er das tut...

translation.en: that prosecutor’s gonna give me the death penalty.
[sniffs] Assuming Dan doesn’t kill me first.
translation.de: Sofern Dan mich nicht vorher umbringt.

translation.en: You don’t know that.
You don’t.
We’re not defined by our pasts.
You’ve remade yourself. You’ve chosen to be a good man.
translation.de: Du hast dich entschieden, ein guter Mann zu sein.

translation.en: It’s a choice. That’s all it is.
In prison, uh, there was a chaplain.
translation.de: Im Gefängnis... gab es einen Seelsorger.

translation.en: Chaplain Morris.
And he sat with me for-- for fuckin’ years.
translation.de: Und er hörte mir... verdammt viele Jahre lang zu.

translation.en: I’m tellin’ ya, if someone tells you for that long that you can be forgiven...
translation.de: Wenn dir jemand so lange einredet, dass dir verziehen werden kann...

translation.en: You’re the only one who made me feel like maybe he was right.
translation.de: Du bist die Einzige, die ihm Recht zu geben scheint.

translation.en: He was.
I need money to run.
-Let’s go. -[Joe] Hey, guys.
[Joe] I’m gonna go.
Big time.
But...
you’re gonna see the playroom first.
Junior, you don’t have to do this. I-- I swear I’m gonna leave.
translation.de: Junior, spar dir das. Versprochen, ich haue ab.

translation.en: What-Whatever Phil is gonna do with your Dad had--
translation.de: Egal was Phil mit deinem Dad...

translation.en: My dad?
My father... is dead.
He was a great man. A king.
translation.de: Er war ein großartiger Mann. Ein König.

translation.en: And...
Well, they’ll never be another one like him, right, fellas?
-Fuck yeah. -[thug] Hmm. [chuckles]
[stammers] Don’t, don’t! No!
Your girlfriend isn’t the most competent nurse I’ve ever seen.
translation.de: Deine Freundin ist nicht die kompetenteste Pflegerin.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, you sound like she did. [laughs]
translation.de: Um Himmels willen, du klingst wie sie.

translation.en: But don’t worry. You’ll see her again.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, ihr seht euch wieder.

translation.en: [Joe] Where is she?
Out there.
[Junior] We’re gonna go in there together, you and me.
We are gonna go down there and work it all out.
translation.de: Wir werden da unten alles klären.

translation.en: [Junior] We got all day, don’t we?
There’s nothing to work out. Uh--
I didn’t do anything. It wasn’t me.
That’s not what she said.
[Joe] We don’t have to do this. It wasn’t me.
translation.de: Erspar uns das. Ich war es nicht.

translation.en: -All right, come on. -[Joe] No. No!
-[thug speaks foreign language] -No. No. No, no, no!
No, no, no, no, no! No!
Who the fuck is this?
[Scotty] I’ll kill you, Junior!
[Scotty] Die, motherfucker!
[Scotty] I see you, Junior! I see you back there, bitch!
translation.de: Ich sehe dich, Junior! Du bist da hinten!

translation.en: [Scotty laughs] There you go, Junior! There you go!
[Scotty] Get some!
Get some!
Now, Bill is my brother!
[Junior] Suck my cock, you fuckin’ retard!
Fuck it.
[Scotty] Fuck, man.
[Scotty] Joe?
[Joe] You hold on, okay? You just hold on.
Scotty, you hear me?
Yeah, yeah, I hear you.
Good.
You’re gonna be fine.
-Getting you help. -Yeah?
’Cause...
you were like a brother to Billy.
translation.de: ...du warst für Billy wie ein Bruder.

translation.en: That makes you like a brother to me, right?
translation.de: Also bist du auch mein Bruder.

translation.en: That’s right.
Except he didn’t fall on any fucking train tracks, did he?
translation.de: Außer dass er nicht auf irgendwelche Gleise gefallen ist, nicht wahr?

translation.en: Not the way they said.
You... put him there.
That’s crazy, Scotty. Just--
We’re almost there, okay?
Junior... told you to do it.
And you did it.
I talked to Phil about it, you know?
-He’s not such a bad guy. -Did you--
Did you maybe take a shot at my house, Scotty?
translation.de: Hast du mein Haus beschossen, Scotty?

translation.en: Sorry.
You slick motherfucker, you.
Thought you said your plan was “no bodies.”
But I ain’t complainin’. You do some work on his brakes or what?
translation.de: Hast du seine Bremsen manipuliert, oder was?

translation.en: His what?
Phil’s car.
-Bitch, I knew it! -[screams]
Motherfucker.
[Dan] Got into a smashup last night. Went up in smoke.
translation.de: Er hatte einen Unfall und ist tot.

translation.en: You did it. You’re free.
Now we’ll get started with the judge, get your girls back.
translation.de: Ich bearbeite den Richter wegen deiner Mädchen.

translation.en: Yes, sir, a brand-new day, Joey. A brand-new day.
How is she?
She’s gonna live.
What are you doing?
I’m leaving.
What are you doing with that?
-You want it? -[scoffs]
-What are you doing with it? -I’m taking it to the girls.
translation.de: -Was machst du damit? -Es den Mädchen bringen.

translation.en: -No, you’re not. -I’m not trying to buy them.
Just gonna give it to ’em.
Most of it.
[sighs] See them once more, and then I’ll just-- No, you’re not.
You are going nowhere near those girls.
translation.de: Du wirst dich ihnen nicht nähern.

translation.en: Money, no money, I don’t care.
You will never be in proximity enough
that your damage and mayhem ever touches them, not even for a second.
translation.de: damit die Zerstörung, die dich begleitet, ihnen nichts anhaben kann.

translation.en: I promise this to you, Son.
This will not happen if I am alive.
Bye, Dad.
I’m... sorry for everything.
No, you’re not listening.
I said it will not happen.
translation.de: Ich sagte, nur über meine Leiche.

translation.en: I said no.
Stop me.
